item.title: Use [#Astro](/tags/astro) rebuild my blog system, now i build the lovely style, integrate with #memos, support ssg, build speed a little faster than [#nextjs](/tags/nextjs) and it also support React components. Hope I can take more time on blog articles.
item.description: Use [#Astro](/tags/astro) rebuild my blog system, now i build the lovely style, integrate with #memos, support ssg, build speed a little faster than [#nextjs](/tags/nextjs) and it also support React components. Hope I can take more time on blog articles.
